San_Marcos.Forensic Anthropology Center at Texas St:
The Forensic Anthropology Center at Texas State (FACTS) is a 26-acre forensic anthropology research facility located on the Freeman Ranch in San Marcos, Texas. It is one of the six extant body farms in the United States and the largest such forensics research facility in the world.
